node.display_long_description:
Throw on some music and smash some drives in this one of a kind Topgolf venue that can only be experienced in VR. Join public games to meet and play with others, or create your own private lounge where you and 7 of your friends can hang out for hours. 


If you’d prefer to get some sun, jump into Pro Putt for a solo round on our epic putting courses, or play with up to 4 players.


- Full swing Topgolf range with your favorite Topgolf games
- Multiplayer experiences that are as much about the golf as they are about hanging out with friends
- Custom Avatars to show off your style
- Realistic physics model
- YouTube web player
- Various Topgolf venue games
- Beautiful putting courses to help you escape
- Competition to match your skill level
- Achievements and leaderboards for bragging rights!

Between the Topgolf venue and Pro Putt courses, we’ve got something for everyone. With our varying difficulties it’s simple enough for a novice, and hard enough for real pros.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Patch update:

- Topgolf bug fix. Certain ball trails would cause a flash of light in hitting areas when ball was struck.
- Other misc bug fixes.

nodes.title: Official Discord Server
nodes.body_text: Join today if you want to learn more about the game, find friends to play with, share feedback, and be the first to know about upcoming updates and early beta access opportunities! Join here!

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
OLD-This game is terrible and the courses suck the single player sucks its not fun and oculus would let me return it and I'm angry 
0 stars

(UPDATED REVIEW)- so after playing the game for the first  time It was laggy, community was terrible just awful. As a golfer I enjoy this now. I say that because when I bought this and posted the review they were very calm. A few weeks ago I got an email saying they fixed the game. So their response team is amazing because there was a 3 month gap in between so they try and fit everyone's needs. I thank the team for being nice and understanding. This is where I go to let off steam. There is a driving range, beer pong with golf, and beanbags in this lounge room. The coolest thing is they are hooked up to YouTube so you can search for a video or music and it plays on a huge movie screen. Sound is also amazing. Putting and lag is fixed too!
node.reviewTitle: (UPDATED) This is the best relaxing game

developerResponse.body: Hey there- thanks for the review and for your patience. We love to hear from our community and are always working to improve the game based on what we hear. It's great to hear that you are enjoying so many of the features the game has to offer!
